name: Employment and Gender attitudes - Pew Research Centre (2012)
title: Employment and Gender attitudes - Pew Research Centre (2012)
description:
Figures for China and India are non-national samples. 

Country figures are taken from the Spring 2010 Survey conducted by the Pew Research Centre with the exception of Turkey, Pakistan, Lebanon, Jordan, and Egypt, for which figures are taken from the Spring 2012 Survey.

fields.name: Share who agree (Pew Research Centre (2012))
fields.description:
Statement posed in the survey: Please tell me whether you completely agree, mostly agree, mostly disagree, or completely disagree with the following statements...When jobs are scarce, men should have more right to a job than women.

To arrive at the 'agree' estimate, we have added the shares corresponding to 'completely agree' and 'mostly agree' for the statement above.
